MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH13 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Firrhill Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.54am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Firrhill Park substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.14pm on the 2nd of February 2021.
